casebody.data:
No. 09-8270. Charles Jerall Smith, Petitioner v. Gene M. Johnson, Director, Virginia Department of Corrections. 559 U.S. 979, 130 S. Ct. 1703,

176 L. Ed. 2d 192,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 2027. March 1, 2010.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 343 Fed. Appx. 949.
